title: 110_hr2726
content: The Act titled "Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act of 2007" makes amendments to law enforcement officer safety provisions in Title 18. The Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act of 2007 amends Section 926B of Title 18, United States Code, by updating definitions related to firearms possession and police powers. The term 'firearm' now includes ammunition and accessories not prohibited by Federal law, excluding machine guns and firearm silencers. The Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act of 2007 updates definitions related to firearms possession and police powers. It includes provisions for law enforcement officers of the Amtrak Police Department and the Federal Government. Retired law enforcement officers are also covered under Section 926C of Title 18, United States Code.
